India’s advertising industry is known for its creativity and energy. Whether you’re looking for the best advertising agency in India or the top creative advertising agency in Bangalore, there are many great choices. Here’s a look at the top 10 advertising agency in India, featuring the largest, most innovative, and most famous companies.
This list of advertising agency in India highlights firms that excel in various areas, from media planning to digital marketing. Each of the list of advertising agency in India stands out for its successful campaigns and strong results, making them key players in the top 10 advertising agency in India. So let’s dive into the advertising agency name list.

List Of The Best Advertising Agencies In India 

  1. Ogilvy India
  2. Brandemic 
  3. Rediffusion
  4. Dentsu India
  5. Mullen Lowe Lintas Group
  6. McCann Erickson India
  7. FCB Ulka Advertising Pvt. Ltd.
  8. Group M Media India Pvt. Ltd.
  9. Growth Hackerz Digital
  10. DDB Mudra Group

Ogilvy India

As a global leader, Ogilvy India is often seen as the top advertising agency in India. They are known for their creative campaigns, strong brand strategies, and effective digital advertising. Ogilvy advertising agency offers a full range of services, combining media advertising with new ideas, which makes them a popular choice for many top brands.

They also use data to guide their strategies, staying up-to-date with market trends and understanding what audiences want. It is often listed among the biggest advertising agencies in India due to their successful and memorable campaigns.

Clients – IBM, Dove, NASCAR, Cadbury, Nationwide Tiffany & Co., Savlon, American Express, IKEA, UPS, Philips, Coke Zero

Iconic campaigns – SRK My Ad, Vi Dabbawalas, Dove #Stopthebeauty Test, and 5 Star Erase Valentine’s Day

Awards – Network of the Year at 2024 D&AD Awards, Most-Awarded Agency at 2024 PR Week Awards, The One Show 2023 and more

SRK My Ad

5 Star Erase Valentine's Day

Brandemic has been counted among the very best and most rapidly ascending branding and advertising agencies in Bangalore for providing promising and reliable branding and consultancy services. As one of the best advertising agencies in Bangalore, focusing on innovation and working together, we conceptualize and deploy strategies for working with clients so they can reach their predefined target markets effectively.

We are a leading media and advertising agency known for our thorough approach. Our varied portfolio shows our caliber in the making of brand logos, brand identities, communication designs, marketing collaterals, and, last but not least, websites—everything designed to make a brand distinguished in today’s competitive landscape.

The result is an ever-creative, strategy-driven insight, dyed with the profound market dynamics that assure every project we carry out helps bring disruptive impact and gives us an edge over some of the other best advertising companies in Bangalore.

At Brandemic, we try to break the mold, and reach out of our comfort zone to deliver memorable brand experiences to audiences. With a resourceful team of professionals and an unrelenting pursuit of excellence, we are bound to be on our way to being a leading force in branding and advertising.

Clients – Eximius Ventures, Urban ladder, Bookmyshow, Freakins, Paper boat etc. 

Awards – SILVER – National Winners

Best Brand Identity, BRONZE – National Winners

Best Brand Website, SILVER – National Winners

Best Corporate Website, GOLD – Regional Winners

Best Corporate Website and more

Brandemic Brand Film

Rediffusion

Rediffusion is a famous advertising agency in India known for its creative ideas and effective advertising strategies. As an important player in the media advertising sector, Rediffusion marketing agency provides a wide range of services, from product ads to brand development. They stand out because of their strong creative approach and deep understanding of what works with audiences.

Rediffusion creates engaging stories that connect emotionally with people, making their campaigns both memorable and successful. They use different media channels to make sure their clients’ messages reach the right people. This focus on creativity and comprehensive service has made Rediffusion one of the top advertising agencies in India.

Clients – Tata Motors, Ambuja, ITC Stationery, Eveready, Emani, Handard

Iconic campaigns – She Remains The Taj, The APAR Magic of Sonu, #KaamyabiKalAajAurKal, New Bike hai, Cycle nahi!

She Remains The Taj

The APAR Magic of Sonu

McCann Erickson India

McCann Erickson is a top name in India’s advertising industry, known for its all-around approach to marketing. As a popular advertising agency, they offer a full range of services, from creating ads to planning media strategies. McCann Erickson stands out for their ability to combine smart planning with creative ideas.

They use market research and consumer insights to design ads that connect with people. Their services cover brand positioning, digital marketing, and media buying, making sure every campaign is effective and well-rounded. Their thorough approach and focus on quality make McCann Erickson a top choice for brands looking to make a big impact.

Clients – Air India, Gyan Diary, Microsoft, Loris, Cococola, Maybelline, Spirite, Master card, etc

Iconic ads – Gyan Dairy – Ghee Film, Air India: Safety Mudras, Coca Cola (#SayItWithCoke), NESCAFÉ Cartoonist (#ItAllStarts)

Air India: Safety Mudras

Coca Cola (#SayItWithCoke)

Mullen Lowe Lintas Group

MullenLowe Lintas Group is the best creative advertising agency in India as it is known for its creative work and smart strategies. As one of the top advertising agencies in Bangalore, they mix creative ideas with data to create strong advertising solutions. They are great at using their creativity and market research to make ads that really connect with people.

MullenLowe Lintas Group carefully studies consumer behaviour and market trends to design campaigns that work well across different media. Their approach includes planning and executing ads to make sure they fit the right channels and reach the right audience. This balance of creativity and strategy helps them achieve great results for their clients and become a leading advertising agency in bangalore.

Clients – Axis Bank, Bajaj, Britannia, Hindustan Unilever, Havells, Idea, Johnson’s Baby, Maruti Suzuki, Micromax, Tata Tea etc.

Iconic campaigns – HP AI PCs, Future Generali Pride 2024 #WelcomeHome, Saffola Masala Oats – T20 World Cup, Surf Excel #PlayForDaag, Google Pay #SabTickHai.

Surf Excel #PlayForDaag

Google Pay #SabTickHai

Growth Hackerz Digital

Growth Hackerz Digital is a digital marketing agency that assists businesses in growing online. Their areas of expertise include the following:

– SEO and Search engine marketing

– Social Media Marketing

– Content Creation

– Paid Advertising

– Data Analysis

As a modern advertising agency, Growth Hackerz Digital is known as a marketing and advertising agency for its creative and engaging marketing strategies. They stand out in the top 10 advertising agencies in India because of their focus on innovation, creativity, and solutions customised for each business. Also somehow they manage to create real growth and help businesses bloom in the digital world. Since they themselves are never behind the trend, neither are their customers concerning competition.

Clients – Amazon, Godrej, Paytm, Haier, Crompton, Induslnd Bank 

Top client case studies – Decathlon, IS.U, Universal robots, DronaHQ

Awards – Top Digital Agency in India (2021), Most Promising Marketing Agency (2022), Top Digital Agencies in India (2022), Top Advertising & Marketing Agency (2022), Most Reviewed Marketing Agency (2022), Clutch Champion and Global Leader (2023), Most Reviewed Marketing Agency (2024), Clutch Global Winner – Spring 2024

DDB Mudra Group

DDB Mudra started in 1980 as Mudra Ahmedabad. The company was a subsidiary of the Reliance Industries advertising division. Its first clients were Vimal and Rasna. It partnered with the DDB Group in 1990. In 2011, Reliance Industries sold its entire stake in DDB Mudra to the Omnicom Group.
The DDB Mudra Group is known as the largest advertising agency in India. It is an innovative advertising agency that includes three agency networks, six specialist agencies, and eleven strategic business units that offer their expertise in four disciplines: Media, OOH, Retail, and Experiential. DDB Mudra Group has offices in 15 cities in India and more than 1,000 employees.

Clients – Aircel, Arvind Stores, Akai, Ashok Leyland, Asian Paints, BPCL, Bank of Baroda, Baxter, Castrol, Cipla, Colgate, Cycle Pure Agarbathies, Dabur, Emirates, Emami, Federal Bank, Future Group, Gillette India, Godrej, Gulf Oil, HDFC Bank,

Iconic campaigns – McDonald’s – It’s Easy to Feel Good (#MealsMakeFamilies), Volkswagen Taigun – #HustleModeOn, Snickers – Noobie Mistakes, Stayfree – It’s Just a Period (This Daughter; ‘s Day, talk to your sons)

Awards – First Indian Agency to win APAC Agency of the Year (2022), Network of the Year (2023), and Lions five years in a row. (2018-2023), India’s Agency of the Year (2021 & 2022), No. 1 Asia, No. 12 Worldwide (2021), No. 2 with 29 Elephants (2021)

McDonald’s – It’s Easy to Feel Good

Volkswagen Taigun – #HustleModeOn

Dentsu Aegis Network

Dentsu is one of the largest advertising agencies in India, offering a mix of traditional and modern advertising solutions. They are a top choice for brands that want to use both online and offline channels effectively. Dentsu’s strength comes from its ability to combine different advertising methods into one smooth campaign.
They use market trends and consumer data to create ads that really connect with people. Their services include media planning, buying, digital marketing, and creative work. This full range of services helps Dentsu create tailored solutions that meet each client’s needs and ensure successful advertising.

Clients – TVS, Swiggy, Meta, Toyota, Reebok, Microsoft, Nissan, MasterCard, etc. 

Iconic campaigns – Voice of Hunger with Swiggy India, Hagglebot with Flipkart India, “Unfiltered History Tour” designed for Vice World Media, etc.

Voice of Hunger with Swiggy

Hagglebot with Flipkart India

FCB Ulka Advertising Pvt. Ltd.

FCB Ulka Advertising Pvt. Ltd. is one of the top digital advertising agencies in India that has a drive toward enhancing business growth by offering innovative marketing solutions. Over the last five decades, they have gone on to foster a team of creative strategists, designers, and storytellers who innovate around brand narrative ideas capable of engaging audiences and delivering results.

They work with passion and in the direction of establishing the voice of brands and creating an indelible mark in the market. As one of the biggest advertising agency in India they are the future of advertising, part of a global network, and dedicated to their clients’ success.

Clients – Kansai Nerolac, John Players, Sunfeast, Mint-o-fresh, Candyman, Snapdeal 

Top campaigns – The Punishment Signal for Mumbai Police, Times Out & proud for the Times of India, The Selfless Selfie – Shakti

Awards – No. 1 Creative Agency in India at Cannes Lions 2021, Agency of the Year at Campaign Asia Agency of the Year Awards 2020, No. 1 Creative Agency in India by Spikes Asia 2021, Most Awarded Agency by The Drum World Creative Rankings 2020, No. 1 in The One Show Global Creative Rankings 2020, Grand Prix hat-trick at Spikes Asia 2021, Gold hat-trick at Andy Awards 2020

The Punishment Signal for Mumbai

Times Out & proud for the Times of

Group M Media India Pvt. Ltd.

It is a leading global media investment group in India, operating under the umbrella of WPP. With a presence in over 100 countries, they leverage their scale and expertise to deliver unparalleled media solutions to their clients.
They are home to some of the world’s most renowned media agencies, including Mindshare, MediaCom, Wavemaker, and Essence. They are committed to helping businesses grow through media innovation and excellence.
It is one of the full-service advertising agencies in India that combines creativity with smart planning. They have a lot of experience and have run many successful campaigns, making them a top choice in India. It is one of the top media advertising agency in India, handling everything from media planning to digital marketing.

Clients – Google, Ford, Nestle, Coca-Cola, Unilever etc 

Iconic campaigns – #TaiyaarHokarAiye for Manyavar

Awards – GroupM Media India Pvt. Ltd. has received several awards and recognitions, including:

– IPA’s People First Promise accreditation for prioritizing employees

– Record performance in 2021 according to COMvergence’s report

– Top spot in Global December R3 2021 New Business Rankings

– Certified as a Top Employer Europe 2022 with five local market accreditations

#TaiyaarHokarAiye for Manyavar

To Sum Up

In conclusion, the list of advertising agency in India showcases a range of top-notch companies known for their creativity and expertise. Whether you’re seeking a commercial advertising agency, a digital advertising agency in India, or a full-service marketing & advertising agency, you’ll find many excellent options among the top 10 advertising agency in India. These agencies are experts in brand advertising, media planning, and digital marketing, offering tailored solutions to meet various needs.

From the best advertising agency in Bangalore to leading digital advertising agency India, each firm brings unique strengths to the table. They excel at crafting effective campaigns that help brands achieve their goals and stand out in the competitive market. By choosing from these top agencies, brands can access top-quality services and innovative strategies to enhance their advertising efforts.

We hope this list has been helpful in guiding you toward the best advertising agencies in India. For more information and guidance on selecting the right advertising partners for your brand, be sure to check out our other blogs.
